title: Detected a Generic API Key, potentially exposing access to various services and sensitive operations.

context.title: Detected a Generic API Key, potentially exposing access to various services and sensitive operations.
context.description:
Hardcoded secret detected: Detected a Generic API Key, potentially exposing access to various services and sensitive operations.
Rule: generic-api-key
Secret: 026d****************************
context.remediation:
1. Remove the hardcoded secret from code
2. Rotate/revoke the exposed credential
3. Use environment variables or secret management (e.g., AWS Secrets Manager, Vault)
4. Add the file to .gitignore if it contains config
5. Use git filter-branch or BFG to remove from history if committed
